person.persName: William Morgan Pollitt (Mason County, Kentucky, physician; ass't surgeon 12th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William H. Pollitt and Lucinda C. Pollitt. Married to Margaret C. Pollitt Pollitt in Mason County on July 6, 1858. Student in Mason County in 1850. Physician in Mason County in 1860. Served in the 16th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as hospital steward from January 31, 1862, to April 9, 1863. Served in the 12th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon from April 9, 1863, to September 18, 1864.
